Texts.Chs: 很久很久以前，在被驱逐者的黎明之前，所有的电子人都平静地生活在一起。他们有自己的村庄、城堡和田地，还有各种各样的机器人喜欢的东西。他们的生活幸福富足，成千上万的头脑一起工作。但是有一天，一个电子人走进城堡，在王座上坐下，大声宣布: “果断。我即是王。”
Texts.Eng: Once upon a time, before the dawn of the Outcasts, all the Glitch lived peacefully together. They had their villages and castles and fields and all sorts of other things that robots like. They lived happily and prosperously, thousands of minds working together. But one day, a single Glitch walked into the castle, took a seat on the throne, and loudly proclaimed; 'Decisive. I am the king.'

Texts.Chs: 其他的电子人盯着这不同寻常的景象看了一会儿，但是也不知道该说什么。他们对一个自封的统治者是毫无防备的。就这样，由于对情况没有真正的了解，电子人被迫服从命令。
Texts.Eng: The other Glitch stared at this unusual sight for a while, but did not know what to say. A self-proclaimed ruler was not something they were prepared for. As such, and with no real understanding of the situation , the Glitch were forced to obey.
